name: fullstackopen-node-express
description: Exercises of the Full Stack Open course - Node.js and Express

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../fullstackopen/part2/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r dist ../../../fullstackopen-node-express/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Bayode Aderinola
